attributes.action: Revise the new regulation on 3D/4D number plates and keep them legal
attributes.additional_details: This is a optional extra on a motor vehicle which will bring in more tax revenue. These are more clear then normal number plates making them easier to read from the naked eye.
attributes.background: Keep the regulation so that 3D/4D numberplate legal if they have the correct font, spacing and size. The new legislation changes September 2021 and should be altered to keep 3D/4D number plates.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/569318
